DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial assess duloxetine comparator placebo patient generalize anxiety disorder .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Duloxetine Hydrochloride , Marketed Comparator , Placebo Treatment Generalized Anxiety Disorder
DOC.criteria: Male female outpatient least 18 year age , present generalize anxiety disorder ( GAD ) . Any current primary Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , Fourth Edition ( DSMIV ) Axis I diagnosis GAD . Patients diagnose major depressive disorder within past 6 month patient diagnose panic disorder , posttraumatic stress disorder , eat disorder within past year obsessivecompulsive disorder , bipolar affective disorder , psychosis factitious disorder , somatoform disorder lifetime The presence Axis II disorder history antisocial behavior , judgement investigator would interfere compliance study protocol Have previously complete withdrawn study study investigate duloxetine previously treat duloxetine History alcohol psychoactive substance abuse dependence ( defined DSMIVTR ) within past 6 month
